comments: Dr. Gurdo is my favorite professor by far. I was a bit nervous coming into this research class but Dr. Gurdo made the topic of research an enjoyable one and used real-life scenarios to really boost my interest as well as my realization for research in the field of psychology. He responded to emails quickly and provided very useful feedback.
Excellent instructor. You will learn a great deal from taking his course.
I love his class, although he gets a little long winded, he is not a hard professor. Do the work, which is not a whole lot and you will pass. I am taking his another one of his classes.

Professor Gurdo is an excellent teacher. He is young and knows what it is like to sit in a class - 2 test which were very easy, 1 group project and literature paper- he makes it worthwile coming to class and plus he wasn\'t that bad to stare at!

Mr. Gurdo is one of the best teachers I have had for any PSY course. His assignments are clear, if you print the pp slides & take notes you will do fine on his tests. One paper, 2 test, 1 group presentation. He is the BOMB!!!
Very nice teacher. Has slide shows every week on the chapters. The paper did not make much sense. But it was his first time teaching this class. I will rate him a 4.
